title: misc/notepadplus: suggest add Function List
body:
Since version 6.4 Notepad++ has support Function List Panel [1][2].

Suggest Function List for Go.

http://notepad-plus-plus.org/news/notepad-6.4-release.html

[2]
http://notepad-plus-plus.org/features/function-list.html
